title: Dishwashing by hand
creator_contributor_role: Los Angeles City Health Department, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/School lunchrooms, cafeteria's etc.
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/School lunchrooms, cafeteria's etc.
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cleaning
description: A film which emphasises the importance of hygienic dish-washing, showing that for health and attractive presentation in either large or small cafeterias, dishes must be scraped, pre-rinsed, washed, rinsed and drained. Both mechanical and hand methods are illustrated.
